system.description: When you scope out a person or place, roll + Mundane.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: You find yourself in over your head. The GM will tell you why this is a bad spot.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value:
Ask one.

  • what’s my best way in/out?
  • what happened here recently?
  • what here is worth grabbing?
  • who or what here is not what they seem?
  • whose place is this?

success.label: Success!
success.value:
Ask two.

  • what’s my best way in/out?
  • what happened here recently?
  • what here is worth grabbing?
  • who or what here is not what they seem?
  • whose place is this?

system.choices:
• What’s my best way in/out?
  • What happened here recently?
  • What here is worth grabbing?
  • Who or what here is not what they seem?
  • Whose place is this?
